rows.label: qst105608_msg001
rows.name: アデルに認めてもらおうとしている 反乱兵士達がいる

rows.label: qst105608_msg0001
rows.name: O great and mighty Adel!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0002
rows.name:
We offer unto you this
testament of lies...

rows.label: qst105608_msg0003
rows.name:
Adel, our hero, we beseech
you! Hear our prayer and
reveal yourself unto us!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0004
rows.name:
Deliver justice to the false
king who led his people astray!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0005
rows.name: Hold it right there!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0006
rows.name: Sigurd! What are you doing here?!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0007
rows.name:
You've done enough fooling around.
Do you seriously think you're
going to summon Adel that way?

rows.label: qst105608_msg0008
rows.name:
This is not "fooling around"!
This is a sacred ceremony to
bring about His resurrection!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0009
rows.name:
Oh yeah? Well, where is he then?
'Cos I don't see him anywhere!
Oh, maybe he's running late?

rows.label: qst105608_msg0010
rows.name: Grrr... Don't mock us!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0011
rows.name:
You'll see soon enough.
Adel will be reborn, and
you will bear witness!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0012
rows.name:
He will come, and He will uproot the
old rule, the false rule, that has
oppressed Luxuria for 500 years!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0013
rows.name:
Okay, they've dialed it
up way past crazy now.

rows.label: qst105608_msg0014
rows.name:
I wouldn't bother trying
to argue with these fanatics
any longer, my Prince.

rows.label: qst105608_msg0015
rows.name: Yeah, it's not looking too hopeful...

rows.label: qst105608_msg0016
rows.name:
I think you've been truly wronged.
Not least by my father...

rows.label: qst105608_msg0017
rows.name:
But getting rid of us isn't going
to help Luxuria whatsoever!

rows.label: qst105608_msg0018
rows.name:
For as long as I breathe, I plan to
do everything I can to make up for
all the lies you've been told.

rows.label: qst105608_msg0019
rows.name:
Anyhow, I can see this isn't getting
through to you. You won't mind if I
get a bit rough then, will you!
